reviewText:
I shudder to think how many people may have been turned off to Shakespeare after watching the first five minutes of this.  Perhaps, twenty-five years ago, this would have held a few students' grudging attention, but I wouldn't dream of trying it now.

I've thoroughly enjoyed other Shakespeare-related DVDs and materials I've ordered from Amazon, so this was a shocking disappointment.

You'll be much better off with Ian McKellen's "Acting Shakespeare" DVD.
